lines.text: Free food, free drinks, free press.
She's tame enough now, Lewis, but will she turn into a slut like the last one?
Do you really believe that you have a licence to ask any dirty question that slimes into that snake's nest between your ears? And nobody challenges you. Why? Because they are gentleman?
[gutteral laugh]
I'll tell you why.
[gesture with Molly Luther's snatched crutch]
Molly Luther's magic wand. It keeps keeps her safe from
[two thumps against Molly Luther's leg brace]
...dragons!
Don't forget the Tibetan yak.
"Films"? "Films"? What the hell ever happened to movies? What do you think you're in, the art business?
I make movies, not films!
Just tell 'em Lylah's coming, soon as she gets her harness on...

[to Barney Sheean]
Squat and wait!

[Talking about choosing a stage name for Elsa]
Elsa Brinkmann. "John Foster Brinksmanship." It's horrible. We'll have to change your name.
Thank you, but I'm happy with the name I have.

"Zarkan the Magnificent." He was a terrible act. I think he finished up cutting his throat in a Hungarian boarding house. Anyway, I lifted his name. Sounds a bit like a Transylvanian pox doctor, but it serves to impress the natives. We'll do the same for you.

[Upon nearing a large greenhouse, while giving Elsa a walking tour of his estate]
You might say that that greenhouse is something of a memorial to her. We had a Japanese gardener that used to look after it. Nice little fellow - quiet as a cherry blossom. Worked out here the best part of ten years, then suddenly one day we were at war. And the Government - who know a dangerous man when they see one - gave him a few hours to pack up before they shipped him off to some god-forsaken concentration camp in the middle of a desert. Lylah was so upset, she came down here to say good-bye to him. You can take my word for it, that gardener had the most *unexpected* going away present he ever had in his life.

[pauses, noticing that Elsa looks somewhat taken aback]
Don't look so shocked... She wasn't married at the time.
I've never seen a woman yet who didn't have a whore locked up somewhere deep inside her.
